verses.verse: I, therefore, <S%G3767><s%> the prisoner <S%G1198><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> entreat <S%G3870><s%> you to walk <S%G4043><s%> in a manner <S%G516><s%> worthy <S%G516><s%> of the calling <S%G2821><s%> with which <S%G3739><s%> you have been called, <S%G2564><s%>

with all <S%G3956><s%> humility <S%G5012><s%> and gentleness, <S%G4240><s%> with patience, <S%G3115><s%> showing <S%G430><s%> forbearance <S%G430><s%> to one <S%G240><s%> another <S%G240><s%> in love, <S%G26><s%>
being diligent <S%G4704><s%> to preserve <S%G5083><s%> the unity <S%G1775><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> in the bond <S%G4886><s%> of peace. <S%G1515><s%>

[There is] one <S%G1520><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> and one <S%G1520><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> just <S%G2531><s%> as also <S%G2532><s%> you were called <S%G2564><s%> in one <S%G1520><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> of your calling; <S%G2821><s%>
one <S%G1520><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> baptism, <S%G908><s%>

one <S%G1520><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> and Father <S%G3962><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> is over <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> and through <S%G1223><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> and in all. <S%G3956><s%>
But to each <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of us grace <S%G5485><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the measure <S%G3358><s%> of Christ's gift. <S%G1431><s%>

Therefore <S%G1352><s%> it says, <S%G3004><s%> "When He ascended <S%G305><s%> on high, <S%G5311><s%> He led <S%G162><s%> captive <S%G162><s%> a host <S%G161><s%> of captives, <S%G161><s%> And He gave <S%G1325><s%> gifts <S%G1390><s%> to men. <S%G444><s%>"

(Now <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G3588><s%> [expression,] "He ascended, <S%G305><s%>" what <S%G5101><s%> does it mean <S%G1510><s%> except <S%G1508><s%> that He also <S%G2532><s%> had descended <S%G2597><s%> into the lower <S%G2737><s%> parts <S%G3313><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%>?

He who descended <S%G2597><s%> is Himself <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> He who ascended <S%G305><s%> far <S%G5231><s%> above <S%G5231><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the heavens, <S%G3772><s%> that He might fill <S%G4137><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things. <S%G3956><s%>)

And He gave <S%G1325><s%> some <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3303><s%> [as] apostles, <S%G652><s%> and some <S%G3588><s%> [as] prophets, <S%G4396><s%> and some <S%G3588><s%> [as] evangelists, <S%G2099><s%> and some <S%G3588><s%> [as] pastors <S%G4166><s%> and teachers, <S%G1320><s%>
for the equipping <S%G2677><s%> of the saints <S%G40><s%> for the work <S%G2041><s%> of service, <S%G1248><s%> to the building <S%G3619><s%> up of the body <S%G4983><s%> of Christ; <S%G5547><s%>

until <S%G3360><s%> we all <S%G3956><s%> attain <S%G2658><s%> to the unity <S%G1775><s%> of the faith, <S%G4102><s%> and of the knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> to a mature <S%G5046><s%> man, <S%G435><s%> to the measure <S%G3358><s%> of the stature <S%G2244><s%> which belongs to the fulness <S%G4138><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

As a result, <S%G2443><s%> we are no <S%G3371><s%> longer <S%G3371><s%> to be children, <S%G3516><s%> tossed <S%G2831><s%> here <S%G2831><s%> and there <S%G2831><s%> by waves, <S%G2831><s%> and carried <S%G4064><s%> about <S%G4064><s%> by every <S%G3956><s%> wind <S%G417><s%> of doctrine, <S%G1319><s%> by the trickery <S%G2940><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> by craftiness <S%G3834><s%> in deceitful <S%G4106><s%> scheming; <S%G3180><s%>

but speaking <S%G226><s%> the truth <S%G226><s%> in love, <S%G26><s%> we are to grow <S%G837><s%> up in all <S%G3956><s%> [aspects] into Him, who <S%G3739><s%> is the head, <S%G2776><s%> [even] Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

from whom <S%G3739><s%> the whole <S%G3956><s%> body, <S%G4983><s%> being fitted <S%G4883><s%> and held <S%G4822><s%> together <S%G4822><s%> <S%G4883><s%> by that which every <S%G3956><s%> joint <S%G860><s%> supplies, <S%G2024><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the proper <S%G3358><s%> working <S%G1753><s%> of each <S%G1538><s%> individual <S%G1520><s%> part, <S%G3313><s%> causes <S%G4160><s%> the growth <S%G838><s%> of the body <S%G4983><s%> for the building <S%G3619><s%> up of itself <S%G1438><s%> in love. <S%G26><s%>

This <S%G3778><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> and affirm <S%G3143><s%> together <S%G1722><s%> with the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> that you walk <S%G4043><s%> no <S%G3371><s%> longer <S%G3371><s%> just <S%G2531><s%> as the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> walk, <S%G4043><s%> in the futility <S%G3153><s%> of their mind, <S%G3563><s%>

being <S%G1510><s%> darkened <S%G4656><s%> in their understanding, <S%G1271><s%> excluded <S%G526><s%> from the life <S%G2222><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the ignorance <S%G52><s%> that is in them, because <S%G1223><s%> of the hardness <S%G4457><s%> of their heart; <S%G2588><s%>

and they, having become <S%G524><s%> callous, <S%G524><s%> have given <S%G3860><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> over <S%G3860><s%> to sensuality, <S%G766><s%> for the practice <S%G2039><s%> of every <S%G3956><s%> kind <S%G3956><s%> of impurity <S%G167><s%> with greediness. <S%G4124><s%>
But you did not learn <S%G3129><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> in this <S%G3779><s%> way, <S%G3779><s%>
if <S%G1487><s%> indeed <S%G1065><s%> you have heard <S%G191><s%> Him and have been taught <S%G1321><s%> in Him, just <S%G2531><s%> as truth <S%G225><s%> is in Jesus, <S%G2424><s%>

that, in reference <S%G2596><s%> to your former <S%G4387><s%> manner <S%G391><s%> of life, <S%G391><s%> you lay <S%G659><s%> aside <S%G659><s%> the old <S%G3820><s%> self, <S%G444><s%> which is being corrupted <S%G5351><s%> in accordance <S%G2596><s%> with the lusts <S%G1939><s%> of deceit, <S%G539><s%>
and that you be renewed <S%G365><s%> in the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of your mind, <S%G3563><s%>

and put <S%G1746><s%> on the new <S%G2537><s%> self, <S%G444><s%> which in [the likeness of] God <S%G2316><s%> has been created <S%G2936><s%> in righteousness <S%G1343><s%> and holiness <S%G3742><s%> of the truth. <S%G225><s%>

Therefore, <S%G1352><s%> laying <S%G659><s%> aside <S%G659><s%> falsehood, <S%G5579><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> truth, <S%G225><s%> each <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1538><s%> [of you,] with his neighbor, <S%G4139><s%> for we are members <S%G3196><s%> of one <S%G240><s%> another. <S%G240><s%>
Be angry, <S%G3710><s%> and [yet] do not sin; <S%G264><s%> do not let the sun <S%G2246><s%> go <S%G1931><s%> down <S%G1931><s%> on your anger, <S%G3950><s%>
and do not give <S%G1325><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%> an opportunity. <S%G5117><s%>

Let him who steals <S%G2813><s%> steal <S%G2813><s%> no <S%G3371><s%> longer; <S%G3371><s%> but rather <S%G3123><s%> let him labor, <S%G2872><s%> performing <S%G2038><s%> with his own <S%G2398><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> what <S%G18><s%> is good, <S%G18><s%> in order <S%G2443><s%> that he may have <S%G2192><s%> [something] to share <S%G3330><s%> with him who has <S%G2192><s%> need. <S%G5532><s%>

Let no <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3956><s%> unwholesome <S%G4550><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> proceed <S%G1607><s%> from your mouth, <S%G4750><s%> but only <S%G1487><s%> such <S%G5100><s%> [a word] as is good <S%G18><s%> for edification <S%G3619><s%> according to the need <S%G5532><s%> [of the moment,] that it may give <S%G1325><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> who hear. <S%G191><s%>

And do not grieve <S%G3076><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> by whom <S%G3739><s%> you were sealed <S%G4972><s%> for the day <S%G2250><s%> of redemption. <S%G629><s%>

Let all <S%G3956><s%> bitterness <S%G4088><s%> and wrath <S%G2372><s%> and anger <S%G3709><s%> and clamor <S%G2906><s%> and slander <S%G988><s%> be put <S%G142><s%> away <S%G142><s%> from you, along <S%G4862><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> malice. <S%G2549><s%>

And be kind <S%G5543><s%> to one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> tender-hearted, forgiving <S%G5483><s%> each <S%G1438><s%> other, <S%G1438><s%> just <S%G2531><s%> as God <S%G2316><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> has forgiven <S%G5483><s%> you.
